statements: DELETE FROM website_traffic_data WHERE user_id = 101 AND referral_source = 'Google';
DELETE FROM website_traffic_data WHERE page_url = '/home' AND visit_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM website_traffic_data WHERE total_visits > 1000 AND date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM marketing_strategies WHERE effectiveness_score < 0.5 OR strategy_name = 'Social Media';
DELETE FROM user_engagement WHERE visit_id = 100 AND time_spent_minutes > 30;
DELETE FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 5 AND budget < 5000.00;
DELETE FROM website_visits WHERE visit_id = 10 AND visitor_id = 100;
DELETE FROM website_pages WHERE page_category = 'Blog' AND page_id = 15;
DELETE FROM visitors WHERE country = 'USA' AND visitor_email = 'john.doe@example.com';
